parrot.tip: Parrot documents ontologies expressed in various formats (RDF/XML, N3, RDFa).
Parrot documents rules expressed in various formats ()RIF/XML and RIF PS).
There is a help page to know the supported items by Parrot.
Parrot allows to upload a document for documentation.
Parrot allows to enter directly the Markup to document.
Parrot report offers two places (prologue and appendix) where add XHTML content to improve the report.
Parrot embeds RDFa in the generated reports.
